#The SELECT function

##1. Brief Description
The SELECT function allows you to pick and choose specific columns from a data frame.

##2. What Package Contains it
The SELECT function is found in the dplyr package.

##3. When to Use it
The SELECT function is useful when you need to subset your data, for example when you need to select only certain columns from a dataset.

##4. Example of How to Use it in R
The SELECT function takes the form of

select(data_frame, column_
